title: SSO Oauth 2 - Open ID PLUGIN FOR OSP MODULES
description: Plugin to delegate OSP authentication to an external IM that supports Oauth 2/Open ID
detailedDescription:
Plugin to delegate OSP authentication to an external IM that supports Oauth 2/Open ID.
Spring Boot project.
installation: Download the zip and read the guide: https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/1077641227/Integrate+onesait+Platform+with+your+own+IM+Oauth+2+-+Open+ID
